attributes.action: Ban Sharia courts in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a country we call on the goverment to remove sharia courts from our country.

Sharia law has no place for the 21st century. We won't want to go back to king Henery the 8th time.

We will not have another tower of london back here in the uk.

Sharia law is a cold darkness spreading round the world. It is about time the UN and EU wake up and look at how many people are suffering under sharia law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
